content:
The CG IG currently has these build errors:

The link 'tbd-codes.html#grouper' for "grouper" cannot be resolved (valid targets: [publish-box, segment-post-footer, hl7-search, hl7-search-lnk, tbd-codes-effect-transporter-function, tbd-codes-region-scope, tbd-codes-somatic-prognostic, hl7-status, root, stripe, segment-footer, logo, segment-content, tbd-codes-mode-of-inheritance, segment-header, tbd-codes-somatic-prognostic-treatment, hl7-logo, tbd-codes-associated-cancer, tbd-codes-somatic-predictive, tbd-codes-region-coverage, tbd-codes-somatic-prognostic-medication, tbd-codes-somatic-predictive-medication, hl7-nav, segment-navbar, tbd-codes-somatic-diagnostic, segment-breadcrumb, tbd-codes-grouper])

the anchor created is named tbd-codes-grouper, but the link to it from the profile html page is tbd-codes.html#grouper
we have several errors of the same kind, i assume this is a IG builder bug?
Looks like it, yes. Can you submit a change request for the IG Publisher - and include a link to the genomics reporting IG that has the issue?
